name: Blastlinks
description:
Blastlinks

This game is something like a "proof of concept". Let me explain:

We've been working on games for at least 3 years, but on all those years we've just created prototypes (and an educational project for a research center) and never focused on finishing projects.  Therefore, this is technically our first game which sees the sunlight.

We are "Rhino Mode ON!", a team composed by Elerson Palermo (programmer) and Andre de Lima (me, designer). We love minimalistic and retro games, especially those with a strong feeling of responsiveness,  and we hope you guys feel that in this game. 

Right now we are managing things to work on another project (this time, something a little bigger).

We hope you guys enjoy our game! 

The RMO Team sends the best regards to all of you!
